products.title: Meadow Nightingale Blue Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Meadow nightingale blue roller blind in blue. Made to measure from 15.13 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
White on blue creates such a striking and classic contrast that helps to make this stylish window blind really pop. The meadow nightingale roller blind features a pollergen treated fabric with a gorgeous design of wild flowers. This window blind is a smart and decorative way to bring peaceful shading to any family space.
 
 Product id: db-rbx2021 fabric colour: nightingale blue material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Meadow Nightingale Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Meadow nightingale blue electric roller blind in blue. Made to measure from 153.92 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The meadow nightingale electric roller blind is decorated with a white floral motif on blue and creates a contrasting effect that will look so striking in situ. The fabric is pollergen treated and can be raised and lowered with ease thanks to the electric remote control, making this blind such a convenient update to any family space.
 
 Product id: db-erbx2021 fabric colour: nightingale blue material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes
